thread.section_title: Hoselink Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hoselink | hoselink.com.au
thread.title: Wendy Usher

author: Wendy Usher
title: Wendy Usher
text:
I have nothing but the highest praise for Hoselink.
On each of the three occasions I have purchased from them my transactions have been easy and the delivery efficient with great follow up.
The products themselves are brilliant and I have gradually been replacing all our garden fittings with Hoselink products which are easy to use and of great quality. I particularly love the retractable hose reel.
It is a pleasure to be dealing with an Australian , family owned company which consistently 'delivers the goods'.
